dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2592672O] AUP VIOLATION - EXCEPTIONALTEMPLATES.COM

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
To Whom It May Concern, 
 
You appear to be hosting a site that is selling/promoting software used
to commit internet fraud: 
 
www.exceptionaltemplates.com 
 
The site itself states that it sells templates for HYIPs. A HYIP (High
Yield Investment Program) is an illegal investment scheme, typically a
ponzi scam. 
More information on HYIPs can be found here: 
 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hyip 
 
Wikipedia defines a HYIP as "HYIPs are Ponzi
schemes<http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponzi_scheme>,
in which new investors (usually unwittingly) provide the cash to pay a
profit to existing investors, which they typically then withdraw leaving
nothing to pay the new investor." Ponzi schemes are illegal in the US. 
 
Since this site is selling tools that promote/enable the commitment of
fraud, the site is in violation of US law and in violation of your AUP. 
Please shut this site down immediately before these criminals are
allowed to sell more templates that enable con men to steal money. 
 
If you have any questions about this site, please do not hesitate to
contact me. 
 
Regards, 
 
Jason Tucker
